title: NcSTAR NC Star CLVSTBAG2982B, Vest Bag, Black
description: Plate carrier tactical vest bag black. Features: - color: black - padded bag for storing and carrying your plate carrier/tactical vest. - padded bag helps with protecting your gear and your body Armor. - a loop of webbing inside with hook and loop fasteners for holding up you carrier/vest inside the bag. Just loop the webbing around the drag handle to hold it up. - heady duty straps for carrying your gear from the locker room to your vehicle. - ID pocket and 3" x 6" loop patch for attaching name/unit/moral patches to the exterior of the bag. - dimensions: 21.5"H x 22"W x 3.5"D
